title: Go spearfishing and run a sushi restaurant in this weird little game
description: Be the chubby, beardy sushi chef of your dreams as Dave the Diver.

title: Xbox boss says regulator concerns around Activision acquisition are fair
description: Phil Spencer is still "confident that we'll get the deal approved."

title: What's your favorite PC you've ever owned?
description: Is there a rig of yore that you still pine for? Or do the beasts of today obliterate your nostalgia?

title: Netflix's Witcher has recast Geralt, with Henry Cavill leaving after season 3
description: Cavill will be passing his medallion and swords to Liam Hemsworth.

title: Discord banned over 55 million accounts, 68 thousand servers in 6 months
description: The first half of 2022 was a busy time for Discord's safety team.

title: Potential Steam feature would be a godsend for users with data caps or slow internet
description: The latest Steam client beta includes early code for moving games between PCs (or to a Steam Deck).

title: Players cannot get enough of Modern Warfare 2’s exploding car map, but some pros absolutely hate it
description: A map that is 90% car is dividing Call of Duty players.

title: Today's Wordle answer and hint for Saturday, October 29
description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for the #497 puzzle.
